bug.summary: TypeError: get_batch_iterator() got an unexpected keyword argument 'buffer_size'
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>ğŸ› Bug</denchmark-h>
The latest code removed the buffer_size parameter in the get_batch_iterator, but still keep passed it in the call. Should this parameter also be removed in the call?
